REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F Y f3534 reute r f BC-MOBIL-<MOB>-HAS-NORTH 06-18 0063

TEXT.TITLE: MOBIL <MOB> HAS NORTH SEA NATURAL GAS FIND
TEXT.BODY: Mobil Corp said the 49/28-14 wildcat well in Block 49/28 of the British North Sea flowed 50.6 mln cubic feet of natural gas per day from depths of 7,742 to 7,777 feet. The company said it has a 23.33 pct interest and other interest holders include Atlantic Richfield Co <ARC>, Sun Co <SUN> and Deminex AG 10 pct. Reuter
